{{help
|topic=+cohorts
|detail=Cohorts are NPC members of your crew who provide material assistance to your crew.
|example=
* '''+cohorts''' - see your crew's cohorts.
* '''+cohort/create <cohort>=<type>''' - create a new crew cohort for a 2 Upgrade cost.
* '''+cohort/destroy <cohort>''' - destroy the cohort. Will ask if you're sure.
* '''+cohort/edit <name>''' - edit your cohort in chargen.
* '''+cohort/set <stat>=<value>''' - change one of your cohort's stats.
* '''+cohort/add <stat>=<value>''' - add a new flaw or edge.
* '''+cohort/remove <stat>=<value>''' - remove a flaw or edge.
